data.eml:eml: Three new species of Horismenus Walker (Hymenoptera: Eulophidae) associated with seed pods of Pithecellobium dulce (Fabaceae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pikart, Tiago G., Costa, Valmir A., Hansson, Christer, Zanuncio, José C., Serrão, José E. (2015): Three new species of Horismenus Walker (Hymenoptera: Eulophidae) associated with seed pods of Pithecellobium dulce (Fabaceae). Zootaxa 3994 (4): 565-578, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3994.4.5
